channel.title: Lambda Core final battle for wimps
channel.description: If one is not in a combative frame of mind, one can complete the final battle in Lambda Core by cowering down the ladder at the base of the reactor core, then when the scientist guy shouts "ready", rushing up the ladder and jumping in. Saves a lot of bother, but doesn't leave one with much of a sense of accomplishment.

item.title: Lambda Core final battle for wimps
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
That could be easily fixed to out you from that location a trigger hurt would do the trick and label as radiation damage… When the machine starts firing up… So it’s a gameplay fix caused by human error and we as playtesters…

Agreed that this should not be allowed once the machine starts full swing

Read full topic
item.source: Lambda Core final battle for wimps

If one is not in a combative frame of mind, one can complete the final battle in Lambda Core by cowering down the ladder at the base of the reactor core, then when the scientist guy shouts “ready”, rushing up the ladder and jumping in.
Saves a lot of bother, but doesn’t leave one with much of a sense of accomplishment.
